reviews.review:
ever since the game became free to play you'll run into cheaters about 90% of the time 
there are cheaters in prime as well and it seems valve wont do anything for now
this game is very fun and very addicting
绝地求生就玩不起来，最后还是喜欢CS
I recommend this game to others who love to play first-person shooter games.
Te vest gaim ai eva pali
This game is not as cringe as i thought
phenomenal FPS game. best competitive FPS experience currently. Lets see how it holds to Project A

Muito bom , nunca fiquei triste quando eu jogo ele , quando eu ficava triste esse jogo me deixava alegre, jogando com pessoas que eu gostava, vivendo momento inesqueciveis da minha vida como meu ''SPRAY DE 2 BALAS'' foi a melhor jogada da minha vida kkkkkkk

Ever wanted to play a game where you can shoot people and be yelled at about something completely irrelevant at the same time? This is your game. Imagine this, you're in match and you see a dude, you shoot at him but miss your shots, MommyhasanewBF then yells at you in voice chat how much of a failure you are in life and then proceeds to tk you. Yep, That's the game.
Counter-Strike Global Offensive muito bom recomendo a todos da steam!!!

>pays 15 dollars so i can grind for rewards. 
>apparently will take over a month for csgo to release all missions to reach 100 stars
>but you can buy all the stars right now. 

never seen a money grab this fucking blatant. Can't even grind if you want to. YOU MUST PAY EVEN MORE TO GET REWARDS.
Игра хорошая, можно найти хороших друзей, в последнее время много обновлений и мне это нравится. Советую всем, развивает реакцию, внимательность и ловкость.
Mesmo jogo há 20 anos, deveria estar no museu ja. péssimo!
Great game, will never get old as it is very fun and you can have more and more fun by improving your skills.
Idk what to put here tbh just reccomending so steam stops asking

С появлением  игре моделей персонажей Я вторую неделю наблюдаю как люди уходят из игры, я тому не исключение.
Если раньше КС была киберспортивной дисциплиной, теперь это гонка-вооружения скинов.
Игроки на про сцене тоже не довольны этим фактором. Посмотрим что изменится после нового года, а пока Прощай КАЭС. Я пошёл играть в КАЛБИР, там скоро турниры и нет Е*УЧИХ моделек персонажей , сливающихся с текстурами. Всем советую. CSGO DEAD.

Gotta love gun shaped barbies

Edit: Gets killed by teammate during the round, loses round. Shoot him back next round, instant ban, what the actual hell is this garbage game.
Fun shooter, you probably already know about it
Slavic players spoil this game with voice chat.
好玩~就是没人带我入门，很难受。
One of the most legendary FPSs of all time

Jogo muito bom, recomendo a todos.

dropped it for two years for LOL and now i'm trash. still pretty good game, and i'm pretty sure its free now so there's no reason not to play it.
Umm yes... you're mom likes girls

O jogo é muito bom, porém despois dessa última atualização do dia 18/11/2019 os bonecos (PLAYERS) ficaram muito lagados, á cada 1 boneco (PLAYER) no jogo diminui 7 FPS. Então numa partida de 10 Players diminui 70 FPS. Só falta otimizar o game. Mas fora isso o jogo e muito bom, muito bom mesmo recomendo demais!.
I like dissapointing the fake sky god with my life choices.
Jogabilidade é muito boa... o que não gosto é que a Valve deixa passar muito cheater e estraga o jogo.

los servidores son medio caca pero por que son de 64 ticks lo que es un problema que no se va a poder solucionar, y el mm siempre te empareja con gente que es malisima 
no tiene mmr como el lol es mas siempre que jugas bien te dicen que chiteas y te sale que tenes conducta anticompetitiva la verdad que es un juego que tiene mucho tiempo y deberia morir de una vez , asi sacan otro counter.
Este juego es infumable, pòrque el minimapa no te permite jugar estrategicamente de forma comoda
